fields.title: Geometry
fields.description: Study of shapes, sizes, and properties of figures

fields.title: Biology
fields.description: Study of living organisms and their interactions

fields.title: Chemistry
fields.description: Study of matter and its properties

fields.question_text: What is the formula for the area of a rectangle?
fields.answer_text: The formula for the area of a rectangle is length x width.
The quadratic formula is used to find the roots of a quadratic equation.
Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants and some other organisms use sunlight to synthesize foods with the help of chlorophyll.

fields.question_text: What are the different stages of mitosis?
fields.answer_text: The stages of mitosis are prophase, metaphase, anaphase, and telophase.
